headline: 3 Reasons to Sell MTD and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Mettler-Toledo’s shares (currently trading at $1,304) have posted a disappointing 8.9% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 8.9% gain. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
